atae/ctn2/P224560
Bel-uballiṭ sangû 04 marʾēšu ša qāt masenni Ubru-Harran Halimu gimru 04 ṣarrāpu ša Dada Hattianu sīrāšû Mannu-ki-Adad marʾušu gimru 03 {URU}bi-x-a.a Mutaqqin-ilu rāʾyu x x urdu ša Nabu-šarhi-ilani x-ahhe {LU₂}x x x x Il-dala {LU₂}x x x x x ša Inurta-ilaʾi 0 Bel-duri Ubru-DN x x Ilu-abu-uṣur x+x x x x {1}x x 15 ti x x x x gimru 05 ša pāhiti x x x Adad-epuš x x x x
